text: Ezekiel Alebua (June 1947 â€“ 7 August 2022) was the third Prime Minister of the Solomon Islands from 1 December 1986 until 28 March 1989. Alebua died on 7 August 2022 from a long-illness in Haimatua, Solomon Islands at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of the Solomon Islands
title: Ezekiel Alebua
